TITLE: Like long Covid, the flu can also lead to long-lasting symptoms
SUMMARY: Patients who were hospitalized with the flu were at an increased risk for lingering lung problems, among other health issues, 18 months after their illness

TITLE: A new coronavirus variant has become dominant, but fewer people are being hospitalized this winter than last
SUMMARY: Wastewater data compiled by the CDC shows Covid activity at a “very high” level

TITLE: Covid drives hospitalizations across the country as winter virus season ramps up
SUMMARY: A jumble of variants are circulating in the U.S., though experts say none stand out as being of concern as holiday travel begins

TITLE: Former British PM Boris Johnson apologizes for pain and suffering during pandemic
SUMMARY: Johnson resigned in disgrace after a series of scandals including reports that he had been present at alcohol-fueled gatherings when most people were forced to stay at home

TITLE: Four more free Covid tests will be available to U.S. households
SUMMARY: The federal government is offering a new batch of free Covid tests, with orders to begin shipping the week of Nov. 27

TITLE: How lawmakers in Texas and Florida undermine Covid vaccination efforts
SUMMARY: State legislatures and politicians are pressuring public health officials to keep quiet about Covid vaccines

TITLE: Covid-19 fraudster used stolen relief aid to purchase a private island in Florida
SUMMARY: An AP review of hundreds of pandemic fraud cases shows thieves and scam artists spent lavishly on houses, diamond jewelry and expensive cars

TITLE: Should you get your Covid and flu shots at the same time? New research suggests yes
SUMMARY: A small study indicated that getting Covid and flu shots together could produce a stronger antibody response against the coronavirus than receiving them separately

TITLE: A new Covid variant has become dominant amid slow uptake of the updated shots
SUMMARY: The HV.1 variant took over this week as the dominant variant in the U.S., but just around 3.5 % of the population has received an updated Covid shot thus far

TITLE: Getting Covid several times can have an outsize effect on Black people, doctors say
SUMMARY: Compounding issues like increased comorbidities and lower access to proper medical care can be destructive for those who get Covid multiple times
